text: It's Pizza Hut. The new location is very conveniently located for campus. It has a seating area but it's not terribly comfortable for large groups. Service is good and  fast.

text:
This as become my favorite Pizza joint in town. Gone are the old days of them baking the pizza with no less then 16 oz of Pam.
The best part, they are consistently good unlike dominos. And they have beer at an affordable rate,that always helps.

text: Domino's is better in my opinion but it still has good food. When you get enough points for a free pizza you still have to meet their minimum charge to get it delivered to your house - you don't have to do that with dominos.
